cameras.title: Sigma FP Digital Camera Full Frame 24.6MP Body
description: World's smallest and lightest full-frame camera; Back-illuminated 35mm full-frame image sensor with 24.6 effective megapixels;
Robust & lightweight aluminum body; Dust- and- splash-proof structure;
Supports UHD 4K/24, 25 & 30 fps; Supports 12-bit Cinema DNG;
Full-time electronic shutter; Continuous shooting up 18 FPS;
Face/Eye Detection AF; HDR Shooting;

cameras.title: Sony A7 III Body Photo Camera Mirrorless 24MP Full Frame 4K
description: Advanced 24.2MP BSI full frame Image Sensor w/ 1.8X readout speed;
Aspect Ratio - 3:2, Headphone Terminal : Yes (3.5 mm Stereo minijack), Mic Terminal : Yes (3.5 mm Stereo minijack);
15 stop dynamic range, 14 bit uncompressed RAW, ISO 50 to 204,800. Compatible with Sony E mount lenses;
Up to 10fps silent or mechanical shutter with AE/AF tracking;
693 phase detection / 425 contrast AF points w/ 93 percent image coverage. Focus sensor: Exmor R CMOS sensor;

cameras.title: Canon EOS R6 Photo Camera Mirrorless Full-Frame 20.1 M
description: High Image Quality featuring a New 20 Megapixel Full-frame CMOS Sensor;
DIGIC X Image Processor with an ISO range of 100-102400; Expandable to 204800;
High-speed continuous shooting of up to 12 fps with Mechanical Shutter and up to 20 fps electronic (silent) shutter;
Dual pixel CMOS AF covering approx. 100% area with 1,053 AF areas;
Video capture resolution: 4K UHD 2160p;

4k uhd 24p and hd 120p for slow motion; Video capture resolution: 2160p;

cameras.title: Fujifilm Instax Wide 300 Photo Camera Instant

Works with Fujifilm Instax Wide Film only - ISO800. Film size: 3.38 x 4.25(inches), picture size: 2.44 x 3.9 (inches);

cameras.title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 40 Photo Camera Instant Black
